alert.note: Alert for Pine (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 28 at 4:44PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHEASTERN PINE, WEST CENTRAL BAYFIELD, DOUGLAS AND NORTHEASTERN BURNETT COUNTIES THROUGH 515 PM CDT... At 443 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Poplar, to 10 miles west of Hawthorne, to 7 miles south of Holyoke, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Hawthorne and Poplar around 450 PM CDT. Maple around 455 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Lake Nebagamon, Brule, Solon Springs and Dairyland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
